thread.title: Jose Rosales II
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Jose Rosales II

author: Jose Rosales II
title: Jose Rosales II
text: Sometimes it can be exhausting shopping for furniture. Not to mention that other places treat you like you'r buying a car. In other words they just want more money. Not this place though. Me and my wife found everything that we were looking for to furnish our new home. American Freight helped us with all of that and did it with a no pressure atmosphere. Amazing deals too!
